com.pathfinder.util.translation

Interface TranslatorSpec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Translator, TranslatorSpecContract

    @ContractReference(value=TranslatorSpecContract.class)
public interface TranslatorSpec
    Specifies methods a translation-utility-class should have
    Author:
    tim

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Locale getFallbackLocale()
      Returns hard coded fallback locale; notice: the fallback locale will not be updated during runtime
      java.util.List<java.util.Locale> getSupportedLocales() 
      boolean isLocaleSupported(java.util.Locale locale)
      Checks, if specified locale is among the list of supported locales
      java.lang.String translate(TranslationKeys key)
      Looks up translation for specified key; uses current locale of UI.
      java.lang.String translate(TranslationKeys key, java.util.Locale locale)
      Looks up translation for specified key and specified locale

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        @Pure
java.lang.String translate(TranslationKeys key,
                                 java.util.Locale locale)
        Looks up translation for specified key and specified locale
        Parameters:
        key - Key for looking up translations
        locale - Target language
        Returns:
        translation or empty String, if language not supported

      • translate

        @Pure
java.lang.String translate(TranslationKeys key)
        Looks up translation for specified key; uses current locale of UI. If UI not yet instantiated, default locale will be taken instead.
        Parameters:
        key - Key for looking up translations
        Returns:
        translation or empty String, if language not supported

      • getFallbackLocale

        @Pure
java.util.Locale getFallbackLocale()
        Returns hard coded fallback locale; notice: the fallback locale will not be updated during runtime
        Returns:
        hard coded default locale

      • isLocaleSupported

        @Pure
boolean isLocaleSupported(java.util.Locale locale)
        Checks, if specified locale is among the list of supported locales
        Parameters:
        locale - locale to be tested
        Returns:
        true, if locale is supported, false, if not or if given locale is null

      • getSupportedLocales

        @Pure
java.util.List<java.util.Locale> getSupportedLocales()
        Returns:
        list of all supported locales
